name: Coffee Clicker
description:
In this game, you can't just drink coffee all day or your manager will get mad! This is a coffee meets water game where you must drink both while you idle tap through the world.

Roast enough coffee, and you will become a tycoon destroying everything in your path and no bagel shop will be able to take you down! Be careful though, the ripple wave of enemies will destroy all your productivity!
